long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Easy How To replaces your new tab with quick access to how to guides & sponsored web search.

The Installation of this extension will configure your New Tab Page to Easy How To. Easy How To extension is all you need to start browsing with quick access to how to guides.

To get started, simply click "How To" on your new Tab Page & Search How To Guides. Example: Type "How To Take A Screenshot" & our system will show the best guide for your search.

Permissions we request:

New Tab:
This permission allows the extension to replace the page you see when opening a new tab

Privacy Policy: https://easyhowto.co/pages/privacy.html
EULA: https://easyhowto.co/pages/eula.html

Uninstall Instructions: 
https://easyhowto.co/uninstall.html
